column4: Alright guys, im really at wits end... i have come in here every day all week trying to get a solution. i asked on the forums... nada. I asked friends, they dont know. I have a broken femur and Im stressed out. Does anyone have any idea whatsoever why starting up kdm shuts off my monitor? It does this set to VESA mode. If i set it to ATI (i have a radeon x700) it will just stay in the prompt and say kdm is running. I tried running en
i guess you could install xinit and see if running xinit gives same problem
